mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(member_id, password, email, name, nick, birth, gender) values(#{memberId},#{password},#{email},#{name},#{nick},#{birth}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select member_id, password, email, name, nick, to_char(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') as birth, gender from member where member_id=#{value}
select member_id, name, email from member where name=#{name} and email=#{email}
select member_id, password, name, email from member where member_id=#{memberId} and name=#{name} and email=#{email}
select member_id, password from member where member_id=#{memberId} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password} where member_id=#{memberId}
update member set nick=#{nick} where member_id=#{memberId}
